Adaptation plans must be based on regional
climate trends and specific farm impacts.

1659.64.text:
Conducting a climate audit using categories
of farm inputs, animal production, logistics,

1663.98.text: and farm exports may be helpful.

1666.31.text:
Listing the likely impacts along with adaptation
options is also helpful.

1670.96.text:
Once the list is developed the costs and benefits
can be evaluated and decisions made.

1675.91.text:
Nothing about adaptation planning is easy
but it is important.
